backend/main.mo: Defines booking and user profile types with access-controlled queries and updates, including booking submission, lookup, and admin-only management.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report referencing the Google verification meta tag added to frontend/index.html.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like list of short summaries for all frontend source files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens, animations, and base utility layers.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry file including charset, viewport, Google verification meta tag, and root script mount.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with root layout and routes for home, admin, and status pages.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI screen showing an access denied message with a button redirecting users to the homepage.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Shared layout with header, navigation (desktop and mobile), login button, footer, and gradient background.
Booking form component with validation, submission handling, and success state showing booking ID.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity and manages authentication state and loading UI.
frontend/src/components/OwnerSection.tsx: Displays owner information with an editable profile image and contact buttons.
Renders a grid of vehicle cards, overriding images for pickup trucks and showing driver info.
frontend/src/constants/vehicles.ts: Defines the Vehicle interface and exports a list of vehicle entries with drivers and images.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, updating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminBookings.ts: Provides admin-focused hooks to check admin status and manage bookings, including fetching, updating, and deleting.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookings.ts: Exposes a hook to submit new bookings and invalidate related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookingStatusLooku: Fetches bookings by phone or numeric query, attempting ID lookup before falling back to phone search.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth state, providing login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Fetches and updates the caller’s user profile through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Re-exports global CSS from the parent index.css.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Implements the admin dashboard for managing bookings, user profile setup, and status updates with UI components.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section, booking form, feature cards, and vehicle section components using animated UI elements.
frontend/src/pages/StatusPage.tsx: Provides a booking status lookup page with a search form and displays matching bookings using icons, badges, and formatted timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL or session-based parameters, including hash‑route support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing implemented features, architecture notes, and versioned requirements for the transport booking app.
